text:
e="preserve">James P. "Jim" White (– January 15, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the New Mexico Senate from 2016 until his death. White was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives from 2009 to 2015. White was a member of the Republican Party.
White died on January 15, 2021 in Albuquerque, New Mexico at the age of 77.
